ygData.subject: Re: Executioners Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: Where in Paw did ya lose your corpse?  I have been everywhere in that place and can give you some pointers.  I successfully hid from Shaman Ren Rex when he was
ygData.messageBody:
Where in Paw did ya lose your corpse? I have
been everywhere in that place and can give you some
pointers. I successfully hid from Shaman Ren Rex
when he was after me for almost an hour before I was
able to make my escape.


Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: James Schuldes[SMTP:jgs@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 8:24 AM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Executioners Axe
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> To get to see her, someone has to complete a quest: Head of Gnasher
> Furgutt.
> There is a named gnoll that needs to be killed and his head needs to be
> given to the Captain of the Guards. He then dispatches the executioner
> who
> walks over to Fish's Ale and kills the barkeep who was Gnasher's partner
> in
> the illegal brewing operations.
>
> I happened to "be in the right place at the right time" and saw her in
> action last night. Later on I got into "the wrong place at the wrong
> time"
> and spent the rest of the night trying to get my corpse from Paw. Have to
> go back tonight and try some more <sigh>.
>
> Snyak.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mifsud, Michael [mailto:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> Sent: Sunday, May 23, 1999 7:57 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Executioners Axe
>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Ill have to make a journey to qeynos, but I heard she was
> level 50. I
> surprising number of guards are green to me there... hmm
> luckily I like
> h'mans.
>
> Jaade D'Vinn
>
> > ----------
> > From: Jones, Brian[SMTP:brian.jones@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 8:59 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Executioners Axe
> >
> > From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
> >
> > The Executioner in Qeynos carries a huge axe and she
> > swings it HARD and FAST. From what people have
> > told me, this is the Executioners Axe
> >
> > Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warriror of the 15th Tier
> > "Periissem ni periisem"
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: Mifsud, Michael[SMTP:Michael.Mifsud@...]

> > > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> > > Subject: [warriors_eq] Executioners Axe
> > >
> > > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> > >
> > > Spoil me please.
> > >
> > > I have asked in game about where this weapon can be
> found, but no one
> > has
> > > even heard of it. Can someone on the list enlighten
> me??
> > >
> > >
> > > Jaade,
> > > Indigo Sista Soldier.
> > >
